title: Opinion: On ‘The Pitt,’ art catches up with the medical debt crisis
description: Joe Sachs, a physician and executive producer on “The Pitt,” and the CEO of Undue Medical Debt weigh in on the show’s foray into a health care crisis.
content: Joe Sachs, a physician and executive producer on “The Pitt,” and the CEO of Undue Medical Debt weigh in on the show’s foray into a health care crisis.
